mapper.select: select VIDEO_SECTION_ID as sectionId, VIDEO_SECTION_NAME as , VIDEO_ID as, VIDEO_SECTION_URL as, VIDEO_SECTION_PATH as , VIDEO_SECTION_SORT as, VIDEO_TOTLE_SORT as , VIDEO_TOTLE_NAME as, PAPER_ID as testPaperId, WORK_ID as workId, COURSE_WARE_ID as coursewareId from TF_EL_VIDEO_SECTION where VIDEO_ID = #{videoId} order by VIDEO_TOTLE_SORT,VIDEO_SECTION_SORT
select vi.video_id,vi.video_name from tf_el_video vi, user_course_rela re where vi.video_id = re.course_id and re.user_id = #{userId} and re.rela_type = '3' group by vi.video_id,vi.video_name
select count(1) from tf_el_video_section where VIDEO_ID = #{videoId}
select * from tf_el_video_section t where VIDEO_ID = #{videoId} order by t.videototle_sort, t.videosection_sort

select vs.videosection_id as section_id, vs.videototle_sort as totlesection_sort, vs.videototle_name as totlesection_name,vs.videosection_sort as section_sort, vs.videosection_name as section_name, vs.video_id as course_id, ucr.isfinish,ucr.class_id, vs.course_wareid as courseware_id from tf_el_video_section vs, user_course_rela ucr where vs.videosection_id = ucr.section_id and ucr.course_id = #{videoId} and ucr.user_id = #{userId} and ucr.class_id = #{classId} order by vs.videototle_sort, vs.videosection_sort
